title: Saintly Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: ['Pastry', '180g gluten-free plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '120ml vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons Alpro Soya Dream', 'Pie Filling', '500g pumpkin puree', '250ml Alpro Soya Dream', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '4 tablespoons cornflour', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon ground cloves']
